character.name: Rosa
description: Her cards generate lots of <c=keyword>card draw</c>, as well as apply various <c=keyword>negative status ailments</c> to the enemy.

Patient.name: Patient
Patient.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, <c=keyword>discount</c> it.

EnhancedTools.name: ENHANCED TOOLS
EnhancedTools.description: The first time you play an <c=cardtrait>improved</c> card each combat, <c=action>improve</c> another card with the same upgrade.

ReusableMaterials.name: REUSABLE MATERIALS
ReusableMaterials.description: After playing a card with <c=cardtrait>improved</c>, gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

Kickstart.name: KICKSTART
Kickstart.description: <c=action>Improve A</c> the first 2 eligible cards you draw each combat. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

MagnifiedLasers.name: MAGNIFIED LASERS
MagnifiedLasers.description: If your rightmost card is an <c=keyword>upgraded</c> card it does +1 damage.

UpgradedTerminal.name: UPGRADED TERMINAL
UpgradedTerminal.description: If you have 3 <c=keyword>upgraded</c> cards in hand when you draw a card, <c=keyword>draw</c> an extra card, once per turn.

Retainer.name: RETAINER
Retainer.description: Cards no longer lose <c=cardtrait>Improved</c> when played.

ExpensiveEquipment.name: EXPENSIVE EQUIPMENT
ExpensiveEquipment.description: <c=boldPink>Non-upgraded</c> cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. All other cards that cost 3 or more energy start each fight with <c=cardtrait>discount</c>. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

PowerEcho.name: POWER ECHO
PowerEcho.description: The first time you play an upgraded card each turn, create an <c=cardtrait>Impaired</c>, <c=cardtrait>single use</c>, <c=cardtrait>temporary</c> <c=keyword>copy</c> of it in your hand. <c=downside>Cannot duplicate Single Use cards!</c>

CleoBooks.name: CRYSTALLINE REFINEMENT
CleoBooks.description: When you play a <c=card>Crystal Shard</c>, the card you draw gains <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

CleoCat.name: NEXT GEN OS
CleoCat.description: Upon pickup, gain an <c=boldPink>A upgraded</c> <c=card>Basic Shot</c>, <c=card>Basic Dodge</c>, and <c=card>Basic Block</c>.

CleoDizzy.name: REACTIVE SHIELDS
CleoDizzy.description: When you <c=action>Impair</c> a card gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> If it is a <c=40a4fc>Dizzy</c> card, give it <c=cardtrait>Improved A</c>. Will instead use the B upgrade if A is not an option.

CleoDrake.name: THERMAL INHIBITORS
CleoDrake.description: When you <c=action>Improve</c> a card lose 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>. When you <c=action>Impair</c> a card gain 1 <c=status>HEAT</c>.

CleoMax.name: FILE REROUTING
CleoMax.description: When you <c=action>exhaust</c> an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> card, <c=action>draw</c> an <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> card from your <c=keyword>Draw pile</c>.

CleoRiggs.name: BOBA+
CleoRiggs.description: For every 3 <c=boldPink>upgraded</c> cards you draw, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.A: Add a <c=card>Small Repairs A</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.
description.B: Add 2 <c=card>Small Repairs</c> to your <c=keyword>draw pile</c>. Gain 2 <c=status>shield</c>.

description.None: Move right 1 and fire a <c=keyword>Seeker</c> for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>.
description.A: Move right 1 and fire a <c=keyword>Seeker</c> for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Discard pile</c>.
description.B: Move right 1 and fire a <c=keyword>Seeker</c> for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in your <c=keyword>Exhaust pile</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=boldPink>A upgrade</c>.
description.A: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the rightmost eligible card in your hand to its <c=boldPink>A upgrade</c>.
description.B: <c=keyword>Upgrade</c> the 2 rightmost eligible cards in your hand to their <c=boldPink>B upgrades</c>.

description.None: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all <c=boldPink>non-upgraded</c> cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.A: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all <c=boldPink>non-upgraded</c> cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.
description.B: <c=keyword>Exhaust</c> all <c=boldPink>non-upgraded</c> cards in hand, then <c=cardtrait>Discount</c> your hand.

description.None: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>. +1 dmg after each attack.
description.A: Attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>. +2 dmg after each attack
description.B: Pierce attack for 1 dmg for each <c=cardtrait>Upgraded</c> card in <c=keyword>hand</c>. +1 dmg after each attack

description.None: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5b48ff>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.
description.A: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5b48ff>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.
description.B: Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=5b48ff>Cleo</c> cards to your hand.

description.None: Add a <c=card>Hold</c> to the <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> to become playable.
Add a <c=card>HOLD</c> to the <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> to become playable.
Add a <c=card>NOW</c> to the <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> to become playable.
Add a <c=card>Returns</c> to the <c=boldPink>exhaust pile</c>. <c=boldPink>Upgrade</c> to become playable.
